046public class DeepDetectionAction extends MapMode implements MouseListener {
047
048
049    //not in use
050/*
051    protected int colorThreshold = ImageAnalyzer.DEFAULT_COLORTHRESHOLD,
052            thinningIterations = ImageAnalyzer.DEFAULT_THINNING_ITERATIONS;
053    protected double toleranceDist = ImageAnalyzer.DEFAULT_TOLERANCEDIST,
054            toleranceAngle = ImageAnalyzer.DEFAULT_TOLERANCEANGLE;

056    protected boolean showAddressDialog = true, mergeNodes = true, useAustriaAdressHelper = false, replaceBuildings = true;
057
058    public static final String PLUGIN_NAME = "deepdetection";
059
060    public static final String KEY_SHOWADDRESSDIALOG = PLUGIN_NAME + ".showaddressdialog",
061            KEY_MERGENODES = PLUGIN_NAME + ".mergenodes", KEY_AAH = PLUGIN_NAME + ".austriaadresshelper",
062            KEY_REPLACEBUILDINGS = PLUGIN_NAME + ".replacebuildings";
063
064    protected Point clickPoint = null;
065
066    public DeepDetectionAction(MapFrame mapFrame) {
067
068
069        //Button Registration
070        super(tr("Deep Detection"), "deepdetection", tr("Select buildings from an underlying image."),
071                Shortcut.registerShortcut("tools:deepdetection", tr("Tools: {0}", tr("Deep Detection")), KeyEvent.VK_A,
072                        Shortcut.ALT_CTRL),
073                getCursor());
074
075        // load prefs
076        this.readPrefs();
077    }
078
079    protected void readPrefs() {
080        this.mergeNodes = new BooleanProperty(KEY_MERGENODES, true).get();
081        this.showAddressDialog = new BooleanProperty(KEY_SHOWADDRESSDIALOG, true).get();
082        useAustriaAdressHelper = new BooleanProperty(KEY_AAH, false).get();
083        replaceBuildings = new BooleanProperty(KEY_REPLACEBUILDINGS, true).get();
084    }
085
086    /**
087     * return a Cursor which provides the mous clicked function
088     * @return
089     */
090    private static Cursor getCursor() {
091        return ImageProvider.getCursor("crosshair", "areaselector");
092    }
093
094    @Override
095    public void enterMode() {
096        if (!isEnabled()) {
097            return;
098        }
099        super.enterMode();
100        MainApplication.getMap().mapView.setCursor(getCursor());
101        MainApplication.getMap().mapView.addMouseListener(this);
102    }
103
104    @Override
105    public void exitMode() {
106        super.exitMode();
107        MainApplication.getMap().mapView.removeMouseListener(this);
108    }
109
110    public void updateMapFrame(MapFrame oldFrame, MapFrame newFrame) {
111        // or not, we just use Main to get the current mapFrame
112    }
113
114    /**
115     * Invoked when the mouse button has been clicked (pressed and released) on
116     * a component.
117     */
118    @Override
119    public void mouseClicked(MouseEvent e) {
120
121        if (!MainApplication.getMap().mapView.isActiveLayerDrawable()) {
122            return;
123        }
124
125        requestFocusInMapView();
126
127        updateKeyModifiers(e);
128        if (e.getButton() == MouseEvent.BUTTON1) {
129            clickPoint = e.getPoint();
130            LatLon coordinates = MainApplication.getMap().mapView.getLatLon(clickPoint.x, clickPoint.y);
131            new Notification("<strong>" + tr("DeepDetection") + "</strong><br />" + tr("Saving area-data from:")
132                    + "<br>" + coordinates.getX() + ", " + coordinates.getY()).setIcon(JOptionPane.INFORMATION_MESSAGE)
133                    .show();
134            SwingUtilities.invokeLater(new Runnable() {
135
136                /**
137                 * Creates satellite image and building outlines-image
138                 */
139                @Override
140                public void run() {
141                    try {
142
143                        BufferedImage bufferedImage_Layer= getLayeredImage();
144                        BufferedImage bufferedImage_Label= getLableImage();
145
146                        int increase=0;
147                        String homepath=System.getProperty("user.home");
148                        File directory = new File(homepath +File.separator+"deep_detection_images");
149
150                        String name=String.valueOf(increase);
151                        String label_path=homepath+File.separator+"deep_detection_images"+File.separator+"layer"+name+".png";
152                        String image_path=homepath+File.separator+"deep_detection_images"+File.separator+"image"+name+".png";
153
154
155                        //Test f√ºr das Schreiben des Bildes
156                        File label_file = new File(label_path);
157                        File image_file = new File(image_path);
158
159                        while(image_file.exists()&& label_file.exists()){
160                            increase++;
161                            name=String.valueOf(increase);
162
163                            label_path=homepath+File.separator+"deep_detection_images"+File.separator+"layer"+name+".png";
164                            image_path=homepath+File.separator+"deep_detection_images"+File.separator+"image"+name+".png";
165                            image_file=new File(image_path);
166                            label_file=new File(label_path);
167
168                        }
169                        if(!image_file.exists()&& !label_file.exists()){
170
171                            if (! directory.exists()){
172                                directory.mkdir();
173                            }
174
175                            ImageIO.write(bufferedImage_Layer, "png", image_file);
176                            ImageIO.write(bufferedImage_Label,"png",label_file);
177                        }
178
179
180                    } catch (Exception ex) {
181                        //log.error("failed to add area", ex);
182                        System.out.println();
183                        JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(MainApplication.getMap(), tr("Unable to save this area : "+ex),
184                                tr("DeepDetection"), JOptionPane.WARNING_MESSAGE);
185
186                    }
187                }
188            });
189
190        }
191    }
192
193
194    /**
195     * Return the image of the the MapView(satellite image)
196     * @return bufImage:  satellite image
197     */
198    public BufferedImage getLayeredImage() {
199
200        MapView mapView = MainApplication.getMap().mapView;
201
202
203        BufferedImage bufImage = new BufferedImage(mapView.getWidth(), mapView.getHeight(),
204                BufferedImage.TYPE_INT_BGR);
205        Graphics2D imgGraphics = bufImage.createGraphics();
206        imgGraphics.setClip(0, 0, mapView.getWidth(), mapView.getHeight());
207
208        for (Layer layer : mapView.getLayerManager().getVisibleLayersInZOrder()) {
209                if(layer.isVisible() && layer.isBackgroundLayer()) {
210                    Composite translucent = AlphaComposite.getInstance(AlphaComposite.SRC_OVER, (float) layer.getOpacity());
211                    imgGraphics.setComposite(translucent);
212                    mapView.paintLayer(layer, imgGraphics);
213                }
214        }
215
216        return bufImage;
217    }
218
219    /**
220     * Return the background-image which provides the building outlines
221     * @return bufferedImage: building outlines
222     */
223    public BufferedImage getLableImage() {
224
225        //Test for GPX-DATA
226        //  List<GpxData> allGpxData = MainApplication.getLayerManager().getActiveDataLayer();
227
228
229        //layer.isVisible() && layer.isBackgroundLayer()
230
231        MapView mapView = MainApplication.getMap().mapView;
232
233
234        BufferedImage bufImage = new BufferedImage(mapView.getWidth(), mapView.getHeight(),
235                BufferedImage.TYPE_INT_BGR);
236        Graphics2D imgGraphics = bufImage.createGraphics();
237        imgGraphics.setClip(0, 0, mapView.getWidth(), mapView.getHeight());
238
239        for (Layer layer : mapView.getLayerManager().getVisibleLayersInZOrder()) {
240            if(layer.isVisible() && !layer.isBackgroundLayer()) {
241                Composite translucent = AlphaComposite.getInstance(AlphaComposite.SRC_OVER, (float) layer.getOpacity());
242                imgGraphics.setComposite(translucent);
243                mapView.paintLayer(layer, imgGraphics);
244            }
245        }
246
247        return bufImage;
248    }

359    /**
360     *
361     * replace an existing way with the new detected one
362     *
363     * @param existingWay old way
364     * @param newWay new way
365     * @return replaced way
366     */
367    public List<Command> replaceWay(Way existingWay, Way newWay){
368        if (existingWay == null || newWay == null){
369            return null;
370        }
371        ArrayList<Command> cmds = new ArrayList<>();
372
373        cmds.add(new RemoveNodesCommand(existingWay, existingWay.getNodes()));
374
375        int i = 1;
376        for (Node existingNode : existingWay.getNodes()){
377            if (i < existingWay.getNodesCount() && existingNode.getParentWays().size() == 1 && !existingNode.isDeleted() && !existingNode.isNew()){
378                //                              log.info("delete node "+existingNode.toString());
379                cmds.add(new DeleteCommand(existingNode));
380            }
381            i++;
382        }
383
384        for (Node newNode : newWay.getNodes()){
385            existingWay.addNode(newNode);
386        }
387        if(newWay.isNew() && !newWay.isDeleted()){
388            cmds.add(new DeleteCommand(newWay));
389        }
390
391        return cmds;
392    }
393
394    public Way createWayFromPolygon(MapView mapView, Polygon polygon) {
395        Way way = new Way();
396
397        Node firstNode = null;
398        for (int i = 0; i < polygon.npoints; i++) {
399            Node node = new Node(mapView.getLatLon(polygon.xpoints[i], polygon.ypoints[i]));
400            if (firstNode == null) {
401                firstNode = node;
402            }
403            way.addNode(node);
404        }
405
406        if (polygon.npoints > 1 && firstNode != null) {
407            way.addNode(firstNode);
408        }
409        return way;
410    }
411
412    /**
413     * Merge Nodes on way to existing nodes
414     */
415    public Way mergeNodes(Way way) {
416        List<Node> deletedNodes = new ArrayList<>();
417        for (int i = 0; i < way.getNodesCount(); i++) {
418            Node node = way.getNode(i);
419
420            List<Node> selectedNodes = new ArrayList<>();
421            selectedNodes.add(node);
422            MapView mapView = MainApplication.getMap().mapView;
423            List<Node> nearestNodes = mapView.getNearestNodes(mapView.getPoint(selectedNodes.get(0)),
424                    selectedNodes, OsmPrimitive::isUsable);
425
426            for (Node n : nearestNodes) {
427                if (!way.containsNode(n) && !deletedNodes.contains(n)) {
428                    selectedNodes.add(n);
429                }
430            }
431            if (selectedNodes.size() > 1) {
432                Node targetNode = MergeNodesAction.selectTargetNode(selectedNodes);
433                Node targetLocationNode = MergeNodesAction.selectTargetLocationNode(selectedNodes);
434                Command c = MergeNodesAction.mergeNodes(selectedNodes, targetNode, targetLocationNode);
435
436                if (c != null) {
437                    UndoRedoHandler.getInstance().add(c);
438                    for (PseudoCommand subCommand : c.getChildren()) {
439                        if (subCommand instanceof DeleteCommand) {
440                            DeleteCommand dc = (DeleteCommand) subCommand;
441                            // check if a deleted node is in the way
442                            for (OsmPrimitive p : dc.getParticipatingPrimitives()) {
443                                if (p instanceof Node) {
444                                    deletedNodes.add((Node) p);
445                                }
446                            }
447                        }
448                    }
449                }
450            }
451        }
452
453        return (Way) MainApplication.getLayerManager().getEditDataSet().getPrimitiveById(way.getId(), OsmPrimitiveType.WAY);
454    }
455
456    /**
457     * merge node with neighbor nodes
458     *
459     * @param node
460     *            node to merge
461     * @return true if node was merged
462     */
463    public Command mergeNode(Node node) {
464        List<Node> selectedNodes = new ArrayList<>();
465        selectedNodes.add(node);
466        MapView mapView = MainApplication.getMap().mapView;
467        List<Node> nearestNodes = mapView.getNearestNodes(mapView.getPoint(selectedNodes.get(0)),
468                selectedNodes, OsmPrimitive::isUsable);
469        selectedNodes.addAll(nearestNodes);
470        Node targetNode = MergeNodesAction.selectTargetNode(selectedNodes);
471        Node targetLocationNode = MergeNodesAction.selectTargetLocationNode(selectedNodes);
472        return MergeNodesAction.mergeNodes(selectedNodes, targetNode, targetLocationNode);
473    }
